actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide protection against reductions in Medicare payment amounts to rural hospitals as a result of reductions in wage indices applicable to such hospitals because of census designations of formerly rural areas as urban.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide protection against reductions in Medicare payment amounts to rural hospitals as a result of reductions in wage indices applicable to such hospitals because of census designations of formerly rural areas as urban.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide protection against reductions in Medicare payment amounts to rural hospitals as a result of reductions in wage indices applicable to such hospitals because of census designations of formerly rural areas as urban.
